channel.title: MacStories on using Drafts in the creation of their iOS 12 review
channel.description:
[Great post from Federico Viticci](https://www.macstories.net/ios/compiling-and-exporting-chapters-for-my-ios-12-review-with-drafts-5/) covering how he utilized Drafts automation to compile and export his (forthcoming) long-form review of iOS 12!
https://www.macstories.net/ios/compiling-and-exporting-chapters-for-my-ios-12-review-with-drafts-5/
